metadata.dcterms:title: Confidently identifying K = 2
metadata.dcterms:creator: Cullingham, Catherine
metadata.dcterms:description: The associated files contain the CLUMPAK (Kopelman et al. 2015) outputs generated from STRUCTURE (Falush et al. 2003, Pritchard et al. 2000) analyses of populations simulations generated in EasyPop (Balloux 2001), where K = 1, 2, or 3
metadata.dcterms:subject: Earth and Environmental Sciences
Medicine, Health and Life Sciences
population structure
genetic structure
migration
metadata.dcterms:isReferencedBy: Cullingham CI, Miller JM, Peery RM, Dupuis JR, Malenfant RM, Gorrell JC, Janes JK. (accepted) Confidently identfying the correct K value using the deltaK method: when does K = 2?. Molecular Ecology (2020)
